data.title: ISS-Above by Liam Kennedy — Kickstarter
data.name: Liam Kennedy
data.description: A device that lights up whenever the International Space Station is nearby (that happens more often than you might expect)

data.title: Manned Mock Mars Mission by Ian Etter — Kickstarter
data.name: Ian Etter
data.description: I will be building a mock space station and simulate living on Mars for two weeks.

data.title: CAT: Launch a Water-Propelled Satellite into Deep Space by Benjamin Longmier, Ph.D. — Kickstarter
data.name: Benjamin Longmier, Ph.D.
data.description: Join the first crowdsourced mission to explore a destination of your choice in the far reaches of space. @GoBluePlasma
